benchmark_details.name: DStruct2Design (Data Structure Driven Generative Floor Plan Design)
benchmark_details.overview: The benchmark facilitates the evaluation of floorplan generation models conditioned on numerical constraints, utilizing a new dataset and a structured representation of floorplans.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset and benchmarks specifically for the evaluation of floorplan generation models under numerical constraints.

data.source: Merged datasets RPLAN and ProcTHOR-10k, converted into a structured JSON format for training and evaluation.
data.size: 80,315 floorplans from RPLAN and 12,000 generated floorplans from ProcTHOR-10k
data.annotation: Automatically generated data structure from existing image-based datasets

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated involve comparison between generated floorplan attributes and specified constraints.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in metrics indicate better adherence to specified constraints and correctness of generated structures.
methodology.baseline_results: The best model variants demonstrate significant improvements over existing floorplan generation methods.
methodology.validation: Validation data is utilized to measure the consistency of generated floorplans against specified constraints.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data from the RPLAN dataset is anonymized to eliminate user and privacy information.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: ProcTHOR-10k dataset under Apache License 2.0. RPLAN dataset has redistribution restrictions.
